: : Rodimus Prime : :
The words shook Rodimus. He hadn't thought of this. Hydras and his feud was a deep, heated, long time rivalry. In one form or another they had fought for millions of years. Hydras would surely pinpoint any loved ones in Rodimus' life. He would have to keep Nightlight and the baby safe.
Rodimus Prime: Well dont worry about it, love. We're all safe, and together.
Spite his words there was evident worry and some anger on his face.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight:

Nightlight moved close to rodimus and she continued touching kindly 
her daughter while the baby  curled close to her mommy giggling and 
purring.

"Well"said Nightlight "It was a strange nightmare, I saw in my 
nightmare that a strange bot witha snake shape attack us, and caught 
us, I saw that that snake sorround our baby, who was crying;  You 
didn't move, it seems that you're incounceos... and I was caught and 
the snake started to strngle me while I heard the snake laught, but 
it was the laught of hydras...    "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: So, what did you see? If you want to talk about it.
>  Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight:
> 
> Nightlight woke up and by a second she didn't know where she was 
after she saw a rodimus said "it was a nightmare... what horrible it 
was"
> 
> She moved and she notieda that her baby was among Rodimus and her, 
the baby moved closed to both and Nighlight touched kindly her baby, 
who purred . Then Nightlight looked to Rodimus and started to relax.
>
